titles.title: A bill for the relief of Arkadi Golovkine, his wife, Valentina Golovkina, and daughter, Olga Golovkina.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Affairs.

bill.summary: 5/7/1993--Introduced. Declares three named individuals to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
